overview: Erika Sawajiri plays Kimiko, the main character of the story who has died. Although the title implies that it is a story of a “wicked woman,” the original novel was divided into 27 chapters, one for each “testimony” by someone who knew Kimiko at some point in her life, providing a range of perspectives on what kind of person Kimiko was.  ~~ Adapted from 1978 novel series "Akujou ni Tsuite" by Ariyoshi Sawako.
title: Akujo ni Tsuite
